:default-current.description_zh: 默认的页数（非受控状态）

:v-model:page-size.description: The number of data entries displayed on each page

:default-page-size.description: Default number of data entries displayed per page (uncontrolled state)
:default-page-size.description_zh: 默认每页展示的数据条数（非受控状态）

hide-on-single-page.description: Whether to hide pagination when a single page

simple.description: Whether it is in simple mode

show-total.description: Whether or not to display the total number of data

show-page-size.description: Whether to display the number of data records selector
show-page-size.description_zh: 是否显示数据条数选择器

:page-size-options.description: A list of options for the number of data bars selector
:page-size-options.description_zh: 数据条数选择器的选项列表

:page-size-props.description: Props of the data number selector

size.description: The size of the pagination selector

:page-item-style.description: The style of the pagination button

:active-page-item-style.description: The style of the current pagination button

:base-size.description: The number of bases that are omitted is displayed in the calculation. The number of omitted items displayed is baseSize + 2 * bufferSize
:base-size.description_zh: 计算显示省略的基础个数。显示省略的个数为 baseSize + 2 * bufferSize

:buffer-size.description: When the ellipsis is displayed, the number of page numbers displayed to the left and right of the current page number
:buffer-size.description_zh: 显示省略号时，当前页码左右显示的页码个数

auto-adjust.description: Whether to adjust the page number when changing the number of data records
auto-adjust.description_zh: 是否在改变数据条数时调整页码

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the page number changes

events.name: page-size-change
events.description: Triggered when the number of data records changes

slots.name: page-item-step
slots.params: type: 'previous'|'next'The type of page item step

slots.name: page-item
slots.params: page: numberThe page number of the paging button
